mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.project_id, c.user_id, u.email, u.nickname, c.contents, c.create_date, c.update_date, c_r.comment_reply_id, c_r.contents as r_contents, c_r.create_date as r_create_date, c_r.update_date as r_update_date, c_r_u.user_id as r_user_id, c_r_u.email as r_email, c_r_u.nickname as r_nickname FROM comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN comment_reply c_r ON c.comment_id = c_r.comment_id LEFT JOIN user c_r_u ON c_r.user_id = c_r_u.user_id WHERE c.comment_id = #{commentId}
